name: Super Dragon Dash
description:
Super Dragon Dash is here. A fast paced platform game with a retro style that will test your skills to the limit. Play for free now!

Unlock the fantastic pieces and create your own dragon! With hundred+ of pieces to unlock, customize your dragon and overcome the different levels of this simple but difficult game.

Go for the glory! Earn stars to ascend in rank. Only the best players can compete in the Pro League. Are you able to reach the summit and gain LEGENDARY rewards?


GAME FEATURES:
- Retro graphics with pixels.
- Simple yet difficult to dominate, play with only one tap.
- Create and personalize your own dragon with one hundred+ of unique pieces.
- Use your skills to the limit in order to overcome the different levels.
- Rank system, show who is in command and get legendary rewards.
- Achievements and leaderboards.

---------
Requirements: Compatible with iPhone 5 or later, iPad and iPod touch. Requires iOS 7.0 or later.
---------
PLEASE NOTE! Super Dragon Dash is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

Please review the game so I can continue improve it!
